body: Hey I have been playing on Avicus since it was McZone but have never really been active on the forums. I have a YouTube channel: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCT6xeVT3mrU7B_OKxlDJ8Hw. I am going to start up a series on here soon. I mainly play nexus and nebula. your welcome to say hi to me if you see me in game.

replies.body: Hey there! Welcome to the Avicus Community, you'll love it here! ^-^ If you have any questions or concerns, feel free to contact any Staff Member, as we will help you! As for that, hope you'll enjoy it here! ^-^
